entry.def: If you refer to something that a group of people talk about as tittle-tattle, you mean that you disapprove of it because it is not important, and there is no real evidence that it is true.

example.ex: ...tittle-tattle about the private lives of minor celebrities.
example.tran: 有关二三流名人隐私生活的闲言碎语

baesInfo.translate_result: kittle cattle任性（或莽撞，反复无常）的人（或动物），难应付的人，难解决（或难理解）的事物
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
